remarks: Alternate definition of the commutes relation.  Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 23.  ( ~ cmbr2i analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmtbr2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
cmtbr2.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
cmtbr2N $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> X = ( ( X .\/ Y ) ./\ ( X .\/ ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) ) ) ) $.
